subject.normal: Thinking on the semantics of Named Graphs

quote.quotepara: This all makes sense only if there is a way for one graph to talk about the truth of another, which I don't think there is, strictly, unless we count owl:imports as a kind of remote assertion.

body.para: I prefer seeing owl:imports as a syntactic mechanism and to stear clear of the potential paradox problems with the log: vocab ...
